tool.name: Multi Omics Factorial Analysis with Muon
tool.command: pip install muon && pip install mofapy2 && python '$script_file'

configfiles.configfile: import scanpy as sc import muon as mu mdata = mu.read_h5mu('$rna_atac_input') mu.tl.mofa(mdata) sc.pp.neighbors(mdata, use_rep="X_mofa") sc.tl.umap(mdata) sc.pl.umap(mdata) mdata.write("rna_atac_integration.h5mu")

tool.help: **What it does** This tool performs multi omics factor analysis using muon.tl.mofa() on an h5mu matrix containing multimodal data.
